description:
## Model Component Registration

Register a model component and its grid configuration.

**This issue creates TWO entities:**
1. The component itself (code, physics, references)
2. The component configuration (links component to grids)

**Prerequisites:** Grid IDs must already exist (submit Grid Bundle issue first if needed).

See the [EMD Specification](https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/Essential-Model-Documentation/) for detailed guidance.

label: Component Type
description: The scientific domain this component represents.\n\nThis will be used as the domain prefix in the component_config ID.

label: Component Name
description:
The name of the model component.

If embedded with no common name, use format: [HostName]-[component]

Example: HadAM3-aerosol

label: Component Family
description: The component's family name (if applicable).\n\nLeave as 'Not applicable' if this is a standalone component or first of its family.

label: Scientific Description
description: Scientific overview of the component.\n\nSummarise the key processes simulated by this component.
placeholder: Describe the key processes simulated by this component...

description:
## Grid Configuration

Link this component to its computational grids.

**Grid IDs must already exist.** Submit a Grid Bundle issue first if you need to create new grids.

label: Horizontal Grid ID
description:
The ID of the horizontal computational grid this component uses.

Example: c100, c101

Leave blank if component has no horizontal grid.

label: Vertical Grid ID
description:
The ID of the vertical computational grid this component uses.

Example: v100, v103

Leave blank if component has no vertical grid.

label: Code Base URL
description:
URL to source code (preferably pointing to a specific version/commit).

Enter 'private' if not publicly available.

Leave blank if not available.

label: Reference DOIs
description: Enter DOI URLs, one per line.\n\nDirect DOI URLs only (no REF### IDs).

## Generated Entities

This issue will create:

1. **Component:** `{component_type}` named `{name}`
   - ID: Auto-generated from name
   - Contains: Description, code, references

2. **Component Config:** Links component to grids
   - ID: `{component_type}_{component_id}_{h_grid}_{v_grid}`
   - UI Label: `{name} with {h_grid} and {v_grid}`
   - Links: component + horizontal_grid + vertical_grid

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
